description: Compile an AFNI package from the git repository.

build_root.title: Build Root
build_root.description: Root directory to use for git and building

clean_root.title: Clean Root Flag
clean_root.description: Specify whether to clean up the build_root. Default is yes.

git_branch.title: Git Branch
git_branch.description: Specify a branch to checkout in git. Default is master.

git_tag.title: Git Tag
git_tag.description: Specify a tag to checkout in git. Default is LAST_TAG.

git_update.title: Git Update Flag
git_update.description: Specify whether to update git repo. Default is yes.

make_target.title: Make Target
make_target.description: Specify target for make command. Default is itall.

makefile.title: Makefile
makefile.description: Specify an alternate Makefile to build from.

package.title: Package
package.description: Specify the desired package to build.

prep_only.title: Prep Only Flag
prep_only.description: Prepare to but do not run (c)make.

run_cmake.title: Run CMake Flag
run_cmake.description: Choose whether to run a cmake build. Default is no.

run_make.title: Run Make Flag
run_make.description: Choose whether to run a make build. Default is yes.

verbose_level.title: Verbose Level
verbose_level.description: Set the verbosity level. Default is 1.
